content.query:
CREATE VIEW World_Bank_Indicators_Unpivoted AS
SELECT
    Country_Name,
    Country_Code,
    Year,
    Age_dependency_ratio_Percent_of_working_age_population,
    Agricultural_land_Percent_of_land_area,
    Agricultural_land_sq_km,
    Agriculture_forestry_and_fishing_value_added_Percent_of_GDP,
    Agriculture_forestry_and_fishing_value_added_current_USD,
    Arable_land_Percent_of_land_area,
    Arable_land_hectares,
    Arms_exports_SIPRI_trend_indicator_values,
    Arms_imports_SIPRI_trend_indicator_values,
    Battle_related_deaths_number_of_people,
    Birth_rate_crude_per_1000_people,
    Chemicals_Percent_of_value_added_in_manufacturing,
    Container_port_traffic_TEU_20_foot_equivalent_units,
    Current_health_expenditure_Percent_of_GDP,
    Current_health_expenditure_per_capita_current_USD,
    Death_rate_crude_per_1000_people,
    Electric_power_consumption_kWh_per_capita,
    Energy_imports_net_Percent_of_energy_use,
    Energy_use_kg_of_oil_equivalent_per_capita,
    Exports_of_goods_and_services_Percent_of_GDP,
    External_debt_stocks_Percent_of_GNI,
    External_debt_stocks_total_DOD_current_USD,
    Fertility_rate_total_births_per_woman,
    Food_beverages_and_tobacco_Percent_of_value_added_in_manufacturing,
    Foreign_direct_investment_net_BoP_current_USD,
    Foreign_direct_investment_net_inflows_BoP_current_USD,
    Forest_area_Percent_of_land_area,
    Forest_area_sq_km,
    GDP_current_USD,
    GDP_growth_annual_Percent,
    GDP_per_capita_current_USD,
    GDP_per_capita_PPP_current_international_dollar,
    GDP_PPP_current_international_dollar,
    GNI_per_capita_Atlas_method_current_USD,
    GNI_per_capita_PPP_current_international_dollar,
    GNI_Atlas_method_current_USD,
    GNI_PPP_current_international_dollar,
    Gini_index,
    Gross_capital_formation_Percent_of_GDP,
    Gross_value_added_at_basic_prices_GVA_current_USD,
    High_technology_exports_Percent_of_manufactured_exports,
    Imports_of_goods_and_services_Percent_of_GDP,
    Income_share_held_by_lowest_20Percent,
    Individuals_using_the_Internet_Percent_of_population,
    Industry_including_construction_value_added_Percent_of_GDP,
    Industry_including_construction_value_added_current_USD,
    Inflation_GDP_deflator_annual_Percent,
    Inflation_consumer_prices_annual_Percent,
    Interest_payments_Percent_of_revenue,
    Internally_displaced_persons_new_displacement_associated_with_disasters_number_of_cases,
    International_migrant_stock_Percent_of_population,
    Labor_force_total,
    Land_area_sq_km,
    Life_expectancy_at_birth_total_years,
    Literacy_rate_adult_total_Percent_of_people_ages_15_and_above,
    Manufacturing_value_added_Percent_of_GDP,
    Manufacturing_value_added_current_USD,
    Market_capitalization_of_listed_domestic_companies_Percent_of_GDP,
    Merchandise_trade_Percent_of_GDP,
    Military_expenditure_Percent_of_GDP,
    Military_expenditure_current_USD,
    Mobile_cellular_subscriptions_per_100_people,
    Mortality_rate_under_5_per_1000_live_births,
    Net_ODA_received_per_capita_current_USD,
    Net_migration,
    PM2decimal5_air_pollution_population_exposed_to_levels_exceeding_WHO_guideline_value_Percent_of_total,
    Personal_remittances_paid_current_USD,
    Personal_remittances_received_Percent_of_GDP,
    Population_growth_annual_Percent,
    Population_female,
    Population_female_Percent_of_total_population,
    Population_male,
    Population_male_Percent_of_total_population,
    Population_total,
    Poverty_headcount_ratio_at_national_poverty_lines_Percent_of_population,
    Prevalence_of_HIV_total_Percent_of_population_ages_15_49,
    Primary_completion_rate_total_Percent_of_relevant_age_group,
    Rail_lines_total_route_km,
    Railways_goods_transported_million_ton_km,
    Railways_passengers_carried_million_passenger_km,
    Revenue_excluding_grants_Percent_of_GDP,
    School_enrollment_primary_and_secondary_gross_gender_parity_index_GPI,
    School_enrollment_secondary_Percent_gross,
    School_enrollment_tertiary_Percent_gross,
    Services_value_added_Percent_of_GDP,
    Services_value_added_current_USD,
    Start_up_procedures_to_register_a_business_number,
    Stocks_traded_total_value_Percent_of_GDP,
    Surface_area_sq_km,
    Survival_to_age_65_female_Percent_of_cohort,
    Survival_to_age_65_male_Percent_of_cohort,
    Tax_revenue_Percent_of_GDP,
    Taxes_on_exports_Percent_of_tax_revenue,
    Total_debt_service_Percent_of_GNI,
    Unemployment_total_Percent_of_total_labor_force_national_estimate,
    Urban_population_Percent_of_total_population,
    Water_productivity_total_constant_2015_USD_GDP_per_cubic_meter_of_total_freshwater_withdrawal

FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://ac2synapsedatalabstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/acj802/Basic_Stats_(WB_Sourced)/World_Bank_Indicators_Unpivoted.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIRSTROW = 2,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        CODEPAGE = '65001', -- UTF-8 encoding
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) WITH (
            Country_Name VARCHAR(255) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
            Country_Code VARCHAR(255) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
            Year NUMERIC,
            Age_dependency_ratio_Percent_of_working_age_population NUMERIC,
            Agricultural_land_Percent_of_land_area NUMERIC,
            Agricultural_land_sq_km NUMERIC,
            Agriculture_forestry_and_fishing_value_added_Percent_of_GDP NUMERIC,
            Agriculture_forestry_and_fishing_value_added_current_USD NUMERIC,
            Arable_land_Percent_of_land_area NUMERIC,
            Arable_land_hectares NUMERIC,
            Arms_exports_SIPRI_trend_indicator_values NUMERIC,
            Arms_imports_SIPRI_trend_indicator_values NUMERIC,
            Battle_related_deaths_number_of_people NUMERIC,
            Birth_rate_crude_per_1000_people NUMERIC,
            Chemicals_Percent_of_value_added_in_manufacturing NUMERIC,
            Container_port_traffic_TEU_20_foot_equivalent_units NUMERIC,
            Current_health_expenditure_Percent_of_GDP NUMERIC,
            Current_health_expenditure_per_capita_current_USD NUMERIC,
            Death_rate_crude_per_1000_people NUMERIC,
            Electric_power_consumption_kWh_per_capita NUMERIC,
            Energy_imports_net_Percent_of_energy_use NUMERIC,
            Energy_use_kg_of_oil_equivalent_per_capita NUMERIC,
            Exports_of_goods_and_services_Percent_of_GDP NUMERIC,
            External_debt_stocks_Percent_of_GNI NUMERIC,
            External_debt_stocks_total_DOD_current_USD NUMERIC,
            Fertility_rate_total_births_per_woman NUMERIC,
            Food_beverages_and_tobacco_Percent_of_value_added_in_manufacturing NUMERIC,
            Foreign_direct_investment_net_BoP_current_USD NUMERIC,
            Foreign_direct_investment_net_inflows_BoP_current_USD NUMERIC,
            Forest_area_Percent_of_land_area NUMERIC,
            Forest_area_sq_km NUMERIC,
            GDP_current_USD NUMERIC,
            GDP_growth_annual_Percent NUMERIC,
            GDP_per_capita_current_USD NUMERIC,
            GDP_per_capita_PPP_current_international_dollar NUMERIC,
            GDP_PPP_current_international_dollar NUMERIC,
            GNI_per_capita_Atlas_method_current_USD NUMERIC,
            GNI_per_capita_PPP_current_international_dollar NUMERIC,
            GNI_Atlas_method_current_USD NUMERIC,
            GNI_PPP_current_international_dollar NUMERIC,
            Gini_index NUMERIC,
            Gross_capital_formation_Percent_of_GDP NUMERIC,
            Gross_value_added_at_basic_prices_GVA_current_USD NUMERIC,
            High_technology_exports_Percent_of_manufactured_exports NUMERIC,
            Imports_of_goods_and_services_Percent_of_GDP NUMERIC,
            Income_share_held_by_lowest_20Percent NUMERIC,
            Individuals_using_the_Internet_Percent_of_population NUMERIC,
            Industry_including_construction_value_added_Percent_of_GDP NUMERIC,
            Industry_including_construction_value_added_current_USD NUMERIC,
            Inflation_GDP_deflator_annual_Percent NUMERIC,
            Inflation_consumer_prices_annual_Percent NUMERIC,
            Interest_payments_Percent_of_revenue NUMERIC,
            Internally_displaced_persons_new_displacement_associated_with_disasters_number_of_cases NUMERIC,
            International_migrant_stock_Percent_of_population NUMERIC,
            Labor_force_total NUMERIC,
            Land_area_sq_km NUMERIC,
            Life_expectancy_at_birth_total_years NUMERIC,
            Literacy_rate_adult_total_Percent_of_people_ages_15_and_above NUMERIC,
            Manufacturing_value_added_Percent_of_GDP NUMERIC,
            Manufacturing_value_added_current_USD NUMERIC,
            Market_capitalization_of_listed_domestic_companies_Percent_of_GDP NUMERIC,
            Merchandise_trade_Percent_of_GDP NUMERIC,
            Military_expenditure_Percent_of_GDP NUMERIC,
            Military_expenditure_current_USD NUMERIC,
            Mobile_cellular_subscriptions_per_100_people NUMERIC,
            Mortality_rate_under_5_per_1000_live_births NUMERIC,
            Net_ODA_received_per_capita_current_USD NUMERIC,
            Net_migration NUMERIC,
            PM2decimal5_air_pollution_population_exposed_to_levels_exceeding_WHO_guideline_value_Percent_of_total NUMERIC,
            Personal_remittances_paid_current_USD NUMERIC,
            Personal_remittances_received_Percent_of_GDP NUMERIC,
            Population_growth_annual_Percent NUMERIC,
            Population_female NUMERIC,
            Population_female_Percent_of_total_population NUMERIC,
            Population_male NUMERIC,
            Population_male_Percent_of_total_population NUMERIC,
            Population_total NUMERIC,
            Poverty_headcount_ratio_at_national_poverty_lines_Percent_of_population NUMERIC,
            Prevalence_of_HIV_total_Percent_of_population_ages_15_49 NUMERIC,
            Primary_completion_rate_total_Percent_of_relevant_age_group NUMERIC,
            Rail_lines_total_route_km NUMERIC,
            Railways_goods_transported_million_ton_km NUMERIC,
            Railways_passengers_carried_million_passenger_km NUMERIC,
            Revenue_excluding_grants_Percent_of_GDP NUMERIC,
            School_enrollment_primary_and_secondary_gross_gender_parity_index_GPI NUMERIC,
            School_enrollment_secondary_Percent_gross NUMERIC,
            School_enrollment_tertiary_Percent_gross NUMERIC,
            Services_value_added_Percent_of_GDP NUMERIC,
            Services_value_added_current_USD NUMERIC,
            Start_up_procedures_to_register_a_business_number NUMERIC,
            Stocks_traded_total_value_Percent_of_GDP NUMERIC,
            Surface_area_sq_km NUMERIC,
            Survival_to_age_65_female_Percent_of_cohort NUMERIC,
            Survival_to_age_65_male_Percent_of_cohort NUMERIC,
            Tax_revenue_Percent_of_GDP NUMERIC,
            Taxes_on_exports_Percent_of_tax_revenue NUMERIC,
            Total_debt_service_Percent_of_GNI NUMERIC,
            Unemployment_total_Percent_of_total_labor_force_national_estimate NUMERIC,
            Urban_population_Percent_of_total_population NUMERIC,
            Water_productivity_total_constant_2015_USD_GDP_per_cubic_meter_of_total_freshwater_withdrawal NUMERIC
    ) AS [result];
GO
